TitleAlt: Nichiro sensō denpō jikki no uchi, Rokoku no Baikaruko hyōjō tetsudō kikai oyobi ressha suichū ni chinbotsu shite shōkō heishi sūjūnin sokushisu. Rokoku unsōryoku ha daishōgai o uketaru mono nari, 日露戰争電報實記之内　露國ノバイカル湖氷上鉄道汽関車及列車水中ニ沈没シテ将校兵士數十人即死ス露國輸送力ハ大障害ヲ受タルモノナリ
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
markings: 三世彫栄; 電浪二九四
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
title: In a True Account by Telegram from the Russo-Japanese War, Engine and Carriages of the Train running over Frozen Lake Baikal, Russia, Sinks in the Water, Killing Scores of Officers and Soldiers Instantly. Russia’s Transport Capacity is Severely Damaged
